Name: Champagne Cup
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: STIR first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir.
Review: Sweet maraschino helps balance this dry drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Champagne Cup contains 111 calories
